title: Google\Cloud\Translate\V3\GcsDestination
name: GcsDestination
description:
The Google Cloud Storage location for the output content.

Generated from protobuf message google.cloud.translation.v3.GcsDestination

Extends Google\Protobuf\Internal\Message

params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.output_uri_prefix
params.description: Required. There must be no files under 'output_uri_prefix'. 'output_uri_prefix' must end with "/" and start with "gs://", otherwise an INVALID_ARGUMENT (400) error is returned.

methods.name: getOutputUriPrefix
methods.description:
Required. There must be no files under 'output_uri_prefix'.

'output_uri_prefix' must end with "/" and start with "gs://", otherwise an INVALID_ARGUMENT (400) error is returned.
